name: fuckyoufriday
text: A comment left by fuckyoufriday was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by RedMange, JesseDaniel, griggs_although)

name: unquotable
text: I love this

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Norsef, BPMead, RedMange, JesseDaniel, Quiet_Drops)

name: tonyhighwind
text: As true as that is, I still hate you.

name: freakywonton
text:
properly maintained grow-rooms are lit with warm lights (both physically warm and warm to your ocular senses), and are very clean. Not to mention the rich green colored leaves and the small, diamondesque crystals that look like dew glittering in the early morning and the heavenly aroma that overwhelms you the second you start to take a walk through god's natural medication.

Roast Beef may not have a good reaction with weed, but he should get Ray to buy him a laptop and spend more time in the grow room.

name: kaithekender
text:
The smell of marijuana, both pre and post smoke, is not something I would refer to as "heavenly"

I am evidently one of a few people in this world for whom the word that best describes the smell of bud is "vomitous".

name: johnnyrocker
text: I don't think it's horrible OR heavenly. It just smells like plants to me, and that's O.K.

name: johnnybaverage
text: I am one of these people, too, apparently. And I have the misfortune of living with someone who lights up quite a bit.

name: delzhand
text: GRO-RAD

name: chaesar
text: I know its hard to properly convey buds using vector graphics but DAMN do those look like popcorn trees in the last panel.

name: k_buttsworthe
text: brosef they are the crunkest of nugz

name: deusoma
text: A weed plant that could also grow already popped popcorn would be the single greastest thing that has ever grown on this planet.

name: spicyponyhead
text:
Yes, but if the popcorn also got you high, you could be stuck in the vicious High Cycle of Munchies.*

*which is why you should NEVER EVER bake delicious pot chocolate chip cookies. dammit

name: layzerblade
text: I have tried to eat cookies while this unfortunately high. My teeth became atomic bombs of sensation, annihilating everything above the neck whenever they clicked together. Drymouth combined with extreme sensory overload to make me feel like I was swallowing boulders, if the boulders were made of rainbows. I'm pretty sure the feeling of digestion alone was so overpowering I couldn't see two feet in front of me. All this was at a party where pretty much no one else was stoned. It was not a very intelligent decision?

name: cygnusx-1
text:
Man I remember when I first started smoking, and what the munchies were like those first few times. All feeling the freshly chewed food slide slowly down your throat. All actually feeling your valves in your throat open and close, freaking out thinking it's going down the wrong tube and into my lungs.

Good times, good times.

name: lucid
text:
I've been smoking for years and I still freak out thinking food is stuck in my throat. Damn near choke on even the smallest bite if I don't wash it down.

I would eat less on weed than a crackhead does generally if everyone around me wasn't always ordering take out every 15 damn minutes.

name: cygnusx-1
text: If you ever come back to see this, munch on some humus and some pita before hand. The smoking just settles your stomach faster and then you don't have to worry about the munchies!

name: iamthelolrus
text: I would save it until after you're high.  Humus and pita bread is fucking amazing when you're blazed.

name: soticoto
text:
I always found mince pies worked well.
After it started one christmas, I pretty much kept our local supermarket making mince pies for an entire year because my brother and I would be stoned every evening and head down around 9 to raid the kitchen cupboard for the mince pies. I'd get through a pack of 12 a day easy, and my brother usually eat most of the other pack... so our mother would hafta go and get more the next day.


Just to clarify, she didn't mind us toking on the weed. She smoked it too. She would actually reward us with it for good behaviour.
Sometimes I wonder if my becoming a dick after I moved to London was in any way connected to not being stoned any more... o_0;

name: jsavinc
text: The chubby that I gave you - give it to your mom please

name: soticoto
text:
... Depending on context, that could be REALLY creepy.
But yeah, I gave her the regards of a stranger on the Internet. It confused her.

name: terriblerobot
text: Maybe...maybe you should start smoking again? Perhaps you wouldn't be so much of a dick, and that would be cool. I know I'm going to start losing my cool faster now that I am in a new place with no contacts for the grelicious green.

name: sharktastic
text: Ugh, I hated not having a hookup. As it is, I have to drive 2 hours for it, but it's so, so worth it. (Gotta make a run this week, I'm OUT and BUGGIN')

name: sharktastic
text: Sometimes stoners can be dicks, but I haven't met too many of that kind. Start smoking again, you could definitely benefit from some mellowing out (have a mince pie or two, too).

name: terriblerobot
text: Woo, I'm moving back to my old town again in a week or so, so no more problems procuring my "chillness in an inhalant".

name: wehavemagnums
text: I like the final panel. He looks so peaceful and happy.

name: apocowarg
text:
This is Cutter, my inbred six-toed cat. He enjoys the benefits of the lamp as well.

[IMGS OFF]

name: scraggg
text: The resemblance is uncanny.

name: rockstarsatemy
text: the key, here, is the box o' warcraft he's lying against.

name: atticusonline
text: the warcraft is so very calming

name: unclerifle
text: You called your cat Cutter?

name: apocowarg
text: Yes, indeed. I got two brothers and named them Cutter and Max. It sounds like a 1980's show about two cops who play by their own rules.

name: awko
text: That is entirely rad.

name: apocowarg
text:
He barely fits now but he still loves his lamp.

[IMGS OFF]

name: atticusonline
text:
I love the upgraded Warcraft box.

Also, your cat is indeed quite rad. Try getting him into some sunglasses and flip-flops.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: they grow up so fast!!

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
fear.

i've yet to play that full game. loved the tech demo...

name: apocowarg
text: The full game is basically a tech demo. Identical enemies, bullet-time, recycled environments and generic creepiness. The A.I. is decent and it's never boring but all and all not a MUST play.

name: bpmead
text:
Cannabis plants in the strip, Warcraft in the photo.

The fantasy of the Achewood world versus the reality of the Achewood reader.

name: deusoma
text: No reason you can't grow pot and play Warcraft. I'd imagine the repetition isn't so bad when you're fucked out of your head.

name: nurdbot
text: Awww. Awesome last panel. Beef looks so happy. Lye is rockingly awesome, letting Beef sleep with his stash.

oh, yes - the post above it.

name: hyetal
text: Somehow, I don't feel so bad about being lamed.

name: selbencoirlo
text: Currently there's an exact even 8 lame distribution between these two posts. I encourage everyone to do their best to try to keep these even. I don't know why. I don't actually care.

name: shutup_shutup
text: I had been wondering about the "SO" part. The More You Know

name: nutmeg
text: i never got this comic until just now! there is nothing funnier than that!!

name: katsura
text: the fact that the squelching is punctuated amuses me greatly.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Molly is so great.

name: buttermoths
text: Yes, she is quite quick on the uptake; I bet Lyle just grunts to confirm 'yes' after her "not until after the Motörhead show?" and she immediately gets it.

name: i_love_kate
text: I liked her socks. Or tights. Or weirdly striped leg fur.

name: nikopol
text: MOLLY SANDERS GETS THINGS DONE

name: hypoluxa
text: Beef doesn't know if he wore his socks in the shower.

name: shatneresque
text: I just went to the psychiatrist and he told me to get a lamp and I would not be sure if I wore pants there if someone else did not check. True story.

name: c_dizzle
text: A comment left by c_dizzle was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by king_of_pwns, scraggg, pulkbaby)

name: jimmykey
text: Is Beef really this tall or is this some artistic license of the way he sees himself, distant and in his own lonely world.

name: fosters
text: I think Beef is pretty tall...I seem to recall him towering over Ray in strips every now and then.

name: nokococo
text: Only when the weight of his circumstances don't drag him down.

name: johnnyc
text: Beef is tall in cat terms but he only comes up to about Onstad's thigh.

name: hugpirate
text: Maybe Molly is just hell of tiny. Remember where she came from and all. They can't have proper proportions in the after life.

name: autrepoupee
text: ahh, at first i thought you meant where she comes from in terms of Wales, in which case you'd definitely be right also because those are some wee folk down there........wait is that what you meant anyway

name: tbtabby
text: Just as it was last year, kindness is HAWT. Likewise for striped stockings.

name: hugpirate
text: I kind of want one of those lamps.

name: salvar
text: Beef doesn't care about the pot. He's just napping and beginning to hope he can feel happiness again.

name: twntysevn27
text: This is a real ass woman. All of you fake women take note.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i never considered that there would be ass women but i guess there would be, huh...

name: nicolae
text: This is the happiest thing.

name: abuncha_nada
text:
MOOOOOTTTOOOOORRRRHHEEEEAAAAAD!!! \m/

Please don't lame the metal...I know I have to learn the hard way, but still, it's Motorhead.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
ASSETBAR tried to lame the metal.
BUT THE ASSETBAR WAS OVERCOME!!!
[/jack black]

name: gunsofray
text: Molly knows the importance of Motorhead to some people.

name: gunsofray
text: ..Molly is a midget?

name: lolsworth
text: Beef is so hollow he does not even know if he wore his socks in the shower
